entries.keep2: Do what you like with it then.  I have no further need for it.
entries.herm2: Well, if the wookiee wants it I don't mind if you give it to her.
entries.keep: She said I could keep it.
entries.hermit: She said give it to the wookiee.
entries.doesnt: Well, what did she suggest you do with it?
entries.newtalk: What appears to be the problem?
entries.sent: Have you finished the task I asked you to do?
entries.ok: Sure I'll take it to her.
entries.explain: My friend the Mon Cal lost her Jacket.  I need a player to take it to her so she doesn't get cold.
entries.bad: Well, then get out of my sight!  I'll find a *REAL* player to help me.
entries.good: Excellent.  I need you to take this jacket to my good friend the Mon Cal over there.   She has on a white long-sleeve shirt, and she needs her jacket!
entries.what: Um...what appears to be the problem?
entries.quest: Ah, good, a player!  Can you help me with something I'm having a problem with?
